item.title: About me
item.description:
I’m Johan, I like gaming, programming, floorball, skiing and many other things. I’m originally from Sweden but I live and work in the United Kingdom. I work at Cognitive Logic, a data startup in Basingstoke, UK.

My (current!) favourite programming languages are Go and Python. I also have a great interest in learning Rust and Elm.

You can find me on the Gophers Slack under the id jbrandhorst, where I like to hang around and discuss Go with fellow Gophers.
